CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ROUND(SLA_Days__c , 0) = 0, ROUND(SLA_Days__c , 0) = 1), IMAGE("/resource/1603357612000/Defect_Header_Milestone_Green", "GREEN", 10, 20), IF( OR(ROUND(SLA_Days__c , 0) = 2, ROUND(SLA_Days__c, 0) = 3), IMAGE("/resource/1603357698000/Defect_Header_Milestone_Amber","AMBER", 10, 20), IMAGE("/resource/1603358099000/Defect_Header_Milestone_Red", "RED", 10, 20)) )
CustomField.label: Milestone Status
